overview: A story of struggle and survival, in a world of deception and hardship for a young beautiful woman to embrace illicit affair in exchange of sustaining the daily grain of life. Hence, an agony of self excruciating by sacrificing moral formation for the sake of  giving financial support to the grieving family. A  student by day and a whirlwind nightingale at night.... she is Alyanna!
title: Maskara sa Mundo ni Alyanna
